trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login"></xref> Web-server control.
trans-unit.target: 在可视化设计器提供设计时支持<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login"> </xref> Web 服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control displays a user interface that allows a user to log on to the host Web site.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件显示允许用户在登录到承载网站的用户界面。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>

trans-unit.source: In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 在可视化设计器中，当从源视图切换到设计视图中，标记源代码描述<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件进行分析，并在设计图面上创建控件的设计时版本。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>

trans-unit.source: When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 当你切换回源视图时，设计时控件的标记源代码持久保存，并编辑向网页上的标记。

trans-unit.source: The LoginDesigner class provides design-time support for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control.
trans-unit.target: LoginDesigner 类提供设计时支持<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>

trans-unit.source: The LoginDesigner class properties provide the following functionality: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property returns a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> class for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer.
trans-unit.target: LoginDesigner 类属性提供了以下功能:-<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.ActionLists%2A>属性返回<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>对象，它通常包含一个对象，派生自<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>的继承树中的每个级别的设计器类。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.ActionLists%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> property returns a collection of formatting schemes for display in the **Auto Format** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>属性返回的格式设置以在中显示的方案集合**自动套用格式**对话框。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> property returns a collection of template groups for the fields of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control and the top-level <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> template.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>属性返回的字段的关联的模板组集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制和顶级<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>模板。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property always returns `true`, indicating that the designer creates a temporary copy of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>属性始终返回`true`，，该值指示设计器将创建关联的临时副本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>来生成设计时标记。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The LoginDesigner class methods provide the following functionality: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method returns the markup that is used to render the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> at design time.
trans-unit.target: LoginDesigner 类方法提供以下功能:-<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法返回用于呈现关联的标记<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>在设计时。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.GetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A> method returns a serialized copy of the template for the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.GetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A>方法返回序列化的副本的模板相关联的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.GetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A> -

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A> method provides the markup that is used to render the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> at design time when an error has occurred.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法提供了用于呈现关联的标记<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>在设计时时出现错误。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.Initialize%2A> method prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.Initialize%2A>方法准备设计器，以查看、 编辑和设计关联的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.Initialize%2A> -

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method is used to remove properties from, add additional properties to, or shadow properties of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>方法用于移除属性、 添加其他属性，或隐藏的关联<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>属性</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>-

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.SetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A> method sets a region of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> from a serialized copy of a control template.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.SetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A>方法会设置关联的区域<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>从控件模板的序列化副本。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.SetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner> class when it creates the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control or a copy of that control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 内部构造的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner>类时创建关联<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件或该控件的设计图面上的副本。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer action-list collection for this designer.
trans-unit.target: 获取此设计器的设计器操作列表集合。

trans-unit.source: The ActionLists property creates a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> object for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner> class, adds it to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object that is obtained from the ActionLists base property, and then returns the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>.
trans-unit.target: ActionLists 属性创建的<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>对象的<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner>类中，将其添加到<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>对象用于从 ActionLists 基属性，获取，然后返回<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> associated with this designer.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"> </xref>与此设计器关联。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner"></xref> control allows resizing.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指定是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner"></xref>控件，可以调整大小。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.RenderOuterTable%2A> property is set to `false`, the control does not allow resizing.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.RenderOuterTable%2A>属性设置为`false`，该控件不允许重设大小。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.RenderOuterTable%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control allows resizing; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控件允许调整大小;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of predefined formatting schemes to display in the **Auto Format** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 获取集合的预定义的格式设置方案，以便在显示**自动套用格式**对话框。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection> object is populated from an XML-encoded member of an internal class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection>对象填充从 XML 编码成员的内部类。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection"></xref> that contains the predefined schemes for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection"> </xref> ，其中包含预定义的方案<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time and populates a collection of designer regions.
trans-unit.target: 获取的标记，用于在设计时呈现关联的控件并填充设计器区域的集合。

trans-unit.source: The GetDesignTimeHtml method creates an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion> object for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LayoutTemplate%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control and adds it to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection> object that is referenced by the `regions` parameter.
trans-unit.target: GetDesignTimeHtml 方法创建<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion>对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LayoutTemplate%2A>属性关联的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件并将其添加到<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection>被引用的对象`regions`参数。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LayoutTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion>

trans-unit.source: The GetDesignTimeHtml method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> base method to generate the markup for the design-time rendering of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control.
trans-unit.target: GetDesignTimeHtml 方法使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>基方法来生成用于在设计时呈现标记<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection"></xref> to which definitions of the selectable and clickable regions in the design-time view of the control are added.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection"> </xref>添加控件的设计时视图中可选择和可单击区域的定义。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the markup used to render the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login"></xref> at design time.
trans-unit.target: 包含用于呈现的标记的字符串<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login"></xref>在设计时。

trans-unit.source: Returns a serialized copy of the template that is used to render the associated control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 返回用于在设计时呈现关联的控件的模板的序列化的副本。

trans-unit.source: The GetEditableDesignerRegionContent method creates a copy of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LayoutTemplate%2A> object of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control in the control container and returns a serialized copy.
trans-unit.target: GetEditableDesignerRegionContent 方法会创建一份<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LayoutTemplate%2A>对象关联的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件容器中的控件并返回序列化的副本。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LayoutTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The serialized template can be restored to a part of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.SetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 序列化的模板可以还原到的一部分<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.SetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.SetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>

trans-unit.source: The `region` parameter is not used by the GetEditableDesignerRegionContent.
trans-unit.target: `region` GetEditableDesignerRegionContent 不使用参数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion"></xref> for which to fetch content.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion"> </xref>要为其提取内容。

trans-unit.source: A string containing a serialized copy of the template used to render the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login"></xref> at design time.
trans-unit.target: 包含用于呈现关联的模板的序列化的副本的字符串<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login"></xref>在设计时。

trans-unit.source: Provides the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time when an error has occurred.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于在发生错误时的设计时呈现关联的控件的标记。

trans-unit.source: The placeholder that the design-time <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control renders contains the type name, the control name, and messages announcing and describing the error.
trans-unit.target: 占位符的设计时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件呈现包含的类型名称、 控件名称和公告和描述错误的消息。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception> that was thrown.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception>所引发。</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the markup used to render the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login"></xref> at design time after an error has occurred.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，包含用于呈现关联的标记<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login"></xref>在设计时后出现错误。

trans-unit.source: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 准备设计器，以查看、 编辑和设计关联的组件。

trans-unit.source: The visual designer calls the Initialize method when it is ready to use the designer to render the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control.
trans-unit.target: 准备设计器用于呈现时，可视化设计器将调用 Initialize 方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>

trans-unit.source: The Initialize method and its base methods configure properties and set up events that are necessary for the operation of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Initialize 方法和其基方法配置属性，并设置所需的设计器操作的事件。

trans-unit.source: The `component` parameter is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control that is associated with this designer or a copy of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control.
trans-unit.target: `component`参数是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>与此设计器或一份相关联的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login"></xref>, that implements an <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login"> </xref>，实现<xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Used by the designer to remove properties from or add additional properties to the display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 在设计器中用于移除属性或添加其他属性的显示中**属性**网格或隐藏关联控件的属性。

trans-unit.source: Control designers use methods that are derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to or remove properties from the **Properties** grid.
trans-unit.target: 控件设计器使用派生自的方法<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法隐藏各种控件属性，用相应的设计时属性设计器实现，并将添加到属性或删除属性从**属性**网格。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LayoutTemplate%2A> property has been defined for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control, the PreFilterProperties sets the <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute> attribute of properties that do not apply when templated to `false` so those properties do not appear in the **Properties** grid.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LayoutTemplate%2A>属性已定义的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制，PreFilterProperties 集<xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute>时到模板化，不应用的属性的属性`false`中未显示这些属性以便**属性**网格。</xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LayoutTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: A collection implementing the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of the added and shadowed properties.
trans-unit.target: 集合实现<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>的添加和隐藏的属性。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner"></xref> control uses an outer table container to apply inline CSS style rules.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指定是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner"></xref>控件使用的外部表容器来应用内联 CSS 样式规则。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner> control uses an outer table container to apply inline style rule in the markup.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner>控件使用的外部表容器来应用标记中的内联样式规则。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner>

trans-unit.source: You can remove the outer table container by setting this property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过将此属性设置为删除外部表容器`true`。

trans-unit.source: Removing the outer table gives you greater flexibility in how you apply CSS rules to the markup that is rendered by the control.
trans-unit.target: 删除外部表，可更好的灵活性，你可如何将 CSS 规则应用于由控件呈现的标记。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control uses an outer table container to apply inline CSS style rules; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果该控件使用的外部表容器来应用内联 CSS 样式规则;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Sets a region of the associated control from a serialized copy of a control template.
trans-unit.target: 将关联控件的区域设置控件模板的序列化副本。

trans-unit.source: The SetEditableDesignerRegionContent method parses a serialized template for the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control that is specified by the `content` parameter, and then uses the template to update the region of the control that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerObject.Name%2A> property of the `region` parameter.
trans-unit.target: SetEditableDesignerRegionContent 方法分析的关联的序列化的模板<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>由指定的控件`content`参数，然后使用模板来更新由指定的控件的区域和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerObject.Name%2A>属性`region`参数。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerObject.Name%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LayoutTemplate%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control can be serialized using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.GetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LayoutTemplate%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>可以使用序列化控件<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.GetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.GetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LayoutTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion"></xref> that provides the name of the region to update.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion"> </xref>提供要更新的区域的名称。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains a serialized template for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，包含用于关联控件的序列化的模板。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of template groups for the fields of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于关联控件字段的模板组集合。

trans-unit.source: The TemplateGroups property gets a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection> object from the TemplateGroups base property, and then adds a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup> object that contains a single <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition> object for the layout template of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection>.
trans-unit.target: TemplateGroups 属性获取的<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection>对象从 TemplateGroups 基属性，并将<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup>包含单个<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition>关联<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>到<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection>。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection>控件</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>的布局模板的对象</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition>的对象</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup></xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection>

trans-unit.source: The TemplateGroups property returns this <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection> to the caller.
trans-unit.target: TemplateGroups 属性返回这<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection>给调用方。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection"></xref> containing an element for each templated field in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection"> </xref>个中每个模板化字段包含一个元素<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the designer should use a temporary copy rather than the actual control associated with the designer to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示设计器是否应使用临时副本，而非与设计器关联的实际控件来生成设计时标记。

trans-unit.source: Because the UsePreviewControl property is always `true`, the designer <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> property returns a copy of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: 因为 UsePreviewControl 属性始终`true`，设计器<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A>属性返回的关联副本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件来生成设计时标记。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> property creates the copy by persisting the actual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control, then parsing the persisted control string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A>属性通过保存的实际创建副本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件，然后再分析的持久化的控制字符串。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The copied control does not affect any persistence for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>.
trans-unit.target: 复制的控件不会影响对<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>任何暂留

trans-unit.source: If the UsePreviewControl property has been overridden to return `false`, the designer uses the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> itself to generate the design-time markup, and design-time changes to the control will persist to the page markup source.
trans-unit.target: 如果 UsePreviewControl 属性已被重写以返回`false`，该设计器使用关联<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>自身来生成设计时标记，并对控件的设计时更改将保存到页标记源。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>

trans-unit.source: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
